name: Wolf of the Roses
description:
For Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam

Your little flower shop has been pretty slow lately, but an order for a bouquet of roses just came in and you're on a time crunch!

To make matters worse, it's gremlin mating seasons and they're swarming your roses at night. Luckily, you happen to be a werewolf, and can gobble them up if they get too close.

Good thing your two halves are stronger together.

Controls: W, A, S, D to move (Controller left stick also works - and is encouraged!)
